This test provides actionable insights for optimizing hormonal balance, improving stress resilience, and enhancing overall wellness.

medications.name: Glutathione

It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: Compounded T3/T4 Thyroid Medication
medications.description: Compounded T3/T4 is a customized thyroid hormone medication containing a specific ratio of liothyronine (T3) and levothyroxine (T4), formulated by a compounding pharmacy to meet individual patient needs when commercially available options are not ideal.
medications.indication: Indicated for the treatment of hypothyroidism in patients requiring a personalized ratio of T3 and T4 to restore optimal thyroid function. It is beneficial for individuals who do not respond adequately to T4-only therapy, experience persistent hypothyroid symptoms, or need a formulation free of allergens or specific excipients.

medications.name: GHK-Cu Peptide Treatment
medications.description: GHK-Cu Peptide is a powerful tripeptide bonded with copper ions, known for its ability to stimulate collagen production, support tissue repair, and combat signs of aging. Backed by decades of scientific research, GHK-Cu is safe for all skin types and a key component in anti-aging and regenerative treatments.
medications.indication: Clinically researched, it improves skin elasticity, reduces wrinkles, balances pigmentation, and promotes hair follicle repair for thicker, healthier hair. Additionally, it accelerates wound healing, reduces inflammation, and strengthens antioxidant defenses, making it ideal for post-procedure recovery and calming irritated skin.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

medications.name: Oral BPC-KPV
medications.description: Oral BPC-KPV is a peptide-based therapy that combines BPC-157, known for its regenerative and anti-inflammatory properties, with KPV, a potent tripeptide derived from alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH) that helps modulate immune response and reduce inflammation. This combination is designed to support gut health, tissue repair, and immune regulation, making it a promising option for individuals with gastrointestinal disorders, inflammatory conditions, and musculoskeletal injuries.
medications.indication: Oral BPC-KPV is indicated for individuals seeking support for gut health, immune modulation, and tissue repair. It is commonly used for conditions such as inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), leaky gut syndrome, gastritis, and other gastrointestinal disorders, as well as chronic inflammation and musculoskeletal injuries. By reducing inflammation, promoting cellular repair, and enhancing gut barrier integrity, BPC-KPV may aid in recovery from injury, optimize gut function, and support overall systemic healing.

supplements.name: Multi-Probiotic Spore + SBC
supplements.description: Multi-Probiotic® Spore + SBC is a unique combination of spore-based bacillus strains plus Saccharomyces boulardii (SBC). Both types of probiotics provide a clinically studied approach to supporting bowel comfort and regularity, gastrointestinal function, and immune health. Spore probiotics are more stable and behave differently than traditional probiotic species by germinating and proliferating in the small intestine.
supplements.indication: Multi-Probiotic Spore + SBC is recommended to support healthy gastrointestinal function, promote balanced gut microbiota, and enhance gut barrier and immune health. The combination of spore-forming probiotics and Saccharomyces boulardii helps improve digestive comfort, resilience of the microbiome, and overall GI stability.

supplements.name: L-Glutamine
supplements.description: L-Glutamine is a conditionally essential amino acid that plays a key role in maintaining the health of the gastrointestinal tract, supporting immune function, and promoting recovery and tissue repair. It serves as a primary fuel source for intestinal cells, helps maintain mucosal integrity, and supports overall gut resilience.
supplements.indication: L-Glutamine is indicated to support gut lining repair, improve digestive comfort, and enhance intestinal barrier function. It may be used for individuals experiencing GI irritation, increased intestinal permeability, or those needing additional support for immune health, recovery, or muscle maintenance.

supplements.name: Zinc Carnosine
supplements.description: Zinc Carnosine is a chelated compound that combines zinc with the dipeptide L-carnosine, allowing for targeted delivery to the stomach and intestines. This form is highly stable and adheres to mucosal surfaces, where it supports tissue repair, reduces oxidative stress, and helps maintain the integrity of the gastrointestinal lining.
supplements.indication: Zinc Carnosine is indicated to support healing of the stomach and intestinal mucosa, reduce GI irritation, and promote a healthy gut barrier. It is commonly used for individuals experiencing gastritis, reflux-related irritation, or increased intestinal permeability, as well as those needing enhanced GI repair and mucosal protection.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

medications.name: Metformin
medications.description: Metformin is a widely used oral medication primarily prescribed for managing type 2 diabetes. It works by improving insulin sensitivity, reducing glucose production in the liver, and enhancing glucose uptake by the body’s cells, effectively lowering blood sugar levels.
medications.indication: Metformin has been studied for its potential benefits in weight management, cardiovascular health, and even anti-aging applications. Its long-standing safety profile and effectiveness make it a cornerstone treatment for metabolic health under the guidance of a healthcare provider.

medications.name: Kisspeptin-10
medications.description: Kisspeptin-10 is a peptide that stimulates the release of gonadotropin-releasing hormone (GnRH) from the hypothalamus. This activation increases Luteinizing Hormone (LH) and Follicle Stimulating Hormone (FSH), which then support natural sex hormone production.
medications.indication: Kisspeptin-10 is commonly used to: Support fertility by enhancing natural reproductive hormone signaling, Improve libido and sexual function, Aid individuals with hypogonadotropic hypogonadism or suppressed LH/FSH, Restore hormone production after previous suppression (e.g., coming off hormone therapy).

medications.name: Tesamorelin/Ipamorelin
medications.description: This is a peptide combination that stimulates your body’s natural growth hormone (GH) release. Tesamorelin works at the hypothalamus to increase GH signaling, while Ipamorelin supports steady GH pulses without significantly raising cortisol or prolactin.
medications.indication: Used to help reduce visceral (deep abdominal) fat, improve body composition, support muscle recovery, enhance sleep quality, and promote metabolic health. Commonly used for patients with stubborn abdominal fat, slowed metabolism, or reduced recovery associated with aging or hormonal decline.

medications.name: Ezetimibe
medications.description: Ezetimibe is a cholesterol-lowering medication that significantly reduces LDL-C while boosting HDL-C, offering additional protective benefits for heart health, non-alcoholic fatty liver disease, and stroke prevention. It also helps lower inflammation by reducing CRP levels, supporting overall cardiovascular wellness.
medications.indication: Lowers bad cholesterol (LDL-C), raises good cholesterol (HDL-C), and supports heart and liver health while reducing inflammation.

medications.name: Larazotide (AT-1001)
medications.description: Larazotide (AT-1001) is an oral peptide that helps regulate intestinal permeability by modulating tight junctions in the gut lining. It is primarily researched for its role in managing leaky gut syndrome, celiac disease, and other inflammatory gut disorders. By preventing the breakdown of tight junctions, Larazotide supports gut barrier integrity, reduces inflammation, and may help mitigate symptoms related to increased intestinal permeability.
medications.indication: Larazotide (AT-1001) 500mcg is indicated for individuals with conditions linked to increased intestinal permeability, such as celiac disease, leaky gut syndrome, inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), and autoimmune disorders. By modulating tight junctions in the gut lining, it helps reduce inflammation, support barrier integrity, and mitigate symptoms like bloating, brain fog, and digestive discomfort. It may also benefit metabolic and neurological conditions related to gut health, making it a promising adjunct therapy for those with chronic inflammation and immune dysregulation.

medications.name: Oral BPC-KPV
medications.description: Oral BPC-KPV is a peptide-based therapy that combines BPC-157, known for its regenerative and anti-inflammatory properties, with KPV, a potent tripeptide derived from alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH) that helps modulate immune response and reduce inflammation. This combination is designed to support gut health, tissue repair, and immune regulation, making it a promising option for individuals with gastrointestinal disorders, inflammatory conditions, and musculoskeletal injuries.
medications.indication: Oral BPC-KPV is indicated for individuals seeking support for gut health, immune modulation, and tissue repair. It is commonly used for conditions such as inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), leaky gut syndrome, gastritis, and other gastrointestinal disorders, as well as chronic inflammation and musculoskeletal injuries. By reducing inflammation, promoting cellular repair, and enhancing gut barrier integrity, BPC-KPV may aid in recovery from injury, optimize gut function, and support overall systemic healing.

supplements.name: Mastic Gum
supplements.description: Mastic gum is a natural resin traditionally used to support gastrointestinal health. It has antimicrobial and soothing properties that help protect the stomach lining, support healthy digestion, and promote balance in the gut microbiome.
supplements.indication: Used to help support the stomach and upper GI tract, particularly in cases of gastritis, reflux symptoms, or H. pylori overgrowth. It may help reduce gut irritation, support mucosal healing, and improve overall digestive comfort.

supplements.name: L-Glutamine
supplements.description: L-Glutamine is a conditionally essential amino acid that plays a key role in maintaining the health of the gastrointestinal tract, supporting immune function, and promoting recovery and tissue repair. It serves as a primary fuel source for intestinal cells, helps maintain mucosal integrity, and supports overall gut resilience.
supplements.indication: L-Glutamine is indicated to support gut lining repair, improve digestive comfort, and enhance intestinal barrier function. It may be used for individuals experiencing GI irritation, increased intestinal permeability, or those needing additional support for immune health, recovery, or muscle maintenance.

supplements.name: Zinc Carnosine
supplements.description: Zinc Carnosine is a chelated compound that combines zinc with the dipeptide L-carnosine, allowing for targeted delivery to the stomach and intestines. This form is highly stable and adheres to mucosal surfaces, where it supports tissue repair, reduces oxidative stress, and helps maintain the integrity of the gastrointestinal lining.
supplements.indication: Zinc Carnosine is indicated to support healing of the stomach and intestinal mucosa, reduce GI irritation, and promote a healthy gut barrier. It is commonly used for individuals experiencing gastritis, reflux-related irritation, or increased intestinal permeability, as well as those needing enhanced GI repair and mucosal protection

supplements.name: Caprylic Acid
supplements.description: Caprylic acid is a medium-chain fatty acid naturally found in coconut oil that supports gut and immune health. It has antifungal and antimicrobial properties and is well known for helping maintain a healthy balance of microorganisms in the gastrointestinal tract.
supplements.indication: Used to help reduce yeast and fungal overgrowth (such as Candida), support microbial balance, and promote improved digestion and gut integrity.

supplements.name: Biocidin Broad Spectrum Liquid Formula
supplements.description: Biocidin is a professional-grade botanical blend designed to support gut microbial balance. It contains a combination of herbal extracts and essential oils with broad-spectrum antimicrobial properties that help target unwanted bacteria, yeast, and parasites while supporting overall digestive and immune health.
supplements.indication: Used to help reduce dysbiosis, bacterial or yeast overgrowth (including SIBO or Candida), support gut detoxification, and promote restoration of a healthy gut microbiome.

supplements.name: Multi-Probiotic Spore + SBC
supplements.description: Multi-Probiotic® Spore + SBC is a unique combination of spore-based bacillus strains plus Saccharomyces boulardii (SBC). Both types of probiotics provide a clinically studied approach to supporting bowel comfort and regularity, gastrointestinal function, and immune health. Spore probiotics are more stable and behave differently than traditional probiotic species by germinating and proliferating in the small intestine.
supplements.indication: Multi-Probiotic Spore + SBC is recommended to support healthy gastrointestinal function, promote balanced gut microbiota, and enhance gut barrier and immune health. The combination of spore-forming probiotics and Saccharomyces boulardii helps improve digestive comfort, resilience of the microbiome, and overall GI stability.

supplements.name: Saccharomyces boulardii
supplements.description: Saccharomyces boulardii is a beneficial probiotic yeast that supports gut and immune health. Unlike bacterial probiotics, it is not affected by antibiotics and helps protect the intestinal lining, support healthy digestion, and promote balance in the gut microbiome.
supplements.indication: Used to help prevent or reduce diarrhea, support gut integrity, and protect against pathogenic bacteria and yeast, including C. difficile and Candida. It is especially helpful during or after antimicrobial or antibiotic use to maintain microbial balance.

medications.description: This compounded peptide therapy combines Sermorelin (a GHRH analog) with CJC and Ipamorelin (growth hormone secretagogues) to stimulate the body’s natural, pulsatile release of growth hormone from the pituitary. By acting on multiple GH pathways, the combination supports more physiologic and consistent growth hormone signaling without directly administering growth hormone.
medications.indication: This combined CJC/Ipamorelin/Sermorelin peptide therapy is indicated for individuals with low or suboptimal growth hormone output who are seeking to support physiologic growth hormone production. It may be used to improve sleep quality, enhance recovery and tissue repair, and support lean muscle maintenance and fat metabolism. This therapy is also commonly utilized to promote healthy aging, improve energy levels, and support overall metabolic function by stimulating the body’s natural, pulsatile release of growth hormone rather than providing exogenous hormone replacement.

medications.name: T3 (Liothyronine)
medications.description: T3, also known as liothyronine, is the active form of thyroid hormone that directly regulates the body’s metabolism. Unlike T4, which must be converted into T3 in the body, T3 is immediately available for use by cells. It plays a key role in energy production, temperature regulation, brain function, heart rate, and the metabolism of fats, carbohydrates, and proteins.
medications.indication: T3 is indicated for patients with symptoms of hypothyroidism who have low or suboptimal T3 levels, particularly when symptoms persist despite adequate T4 therapy. It is commonly used in individuals with poor T4-to-T3 conversion, autoimmune thyroid conditions such as Hashimoto’s, or ongoing symptoms including fatigue, brain fog, cold intolerance, hair thinning, dry skin, and difficulty with weight management. T3 may be used alone or in combination with T4 to optimize thyroid function, energy levels, and metabolic balance.

medications.name: Estrogen Replacement
medications.description: Estrogen Therapies offer a tailored approach to supporting hormonal balance, enhancing vitality, and improving overall well-being.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

medications.indication: For individuals experiencing low energy, poor recovery, and persistent fatigue, especially when accompanied by difficulty losing fat or building lean muscle. It supports improved exercise performance and tissue repair by enhancing the body’s natural, pulsatile growth hormone release, which commonly declines with age, chronic stress, and metabolic dysfunction. This combination is particularly beneficial in metabolically compromised individuals because it promotes fat loss, recovery, and lean mass support without significantly impacting insulin levels, making it a safe and effective adjunct to comprehensive metabolic and hormone optimization programs.

medications.name: BPC-157
medications.description: BPC-157 Therapy offers cutting-edge treatment designed to support healing, recovery, and overall wellness.
medications.indication: BPC-157 therapy promotes tissue repair, reduces inflammation, and enhances recovery from injuries or physical strain.

medications.name: Enclomiphene
medications.description: A selective estrogen receptor modulator (SERM) used to increase testosterone production in men by stimulating the natural production of luteinizing hormone (LH) and follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH).
medications.indication: A powerful testosterone booster that enhances natural production while supporting fertility. Unlike traditional options, Enclomiphene helps maintain testicular function and sperm count, ensuring optimized hormone levels without compromising reproductive health.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

medications.name: Metformin
medications.description: Metformin is a widely used oral medication primarily prescribed for managing type 2 diabetes. It works by improving insulin sensitivity, reducing glucose production in the liver, and enhancing glucose uptake by the body’s cells, effectively lowering blood sugar levels.
medications.indication: Metformin has been studied for its potential benefits in weight management, cardiovascular health, and even anti-aging applications. Its long-standing safety profile and effectiveness make it a cornerstone treatment for metabolic health under the guidance of a healthcare provider.

medications.name: Tirzepatide

medications.indication: The dual-action GLP-1 and GIP receptor agonist. Tirzepatide targets multiple pathways to enhance appetite control, improve insulin sensitivity, and promote effective fat loss.

MOTS-c improves glucose utilization, increases fat oxidation, reduces inflammation, and supports healthy aging and exercise recovery.

medications.name: NAD+

medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description:
Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor
antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used
for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound
increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune
system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic
conditions.
medications.indication:
Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and
inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis,
rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN
helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom
control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

medications.name: Compounded T3/T4 Thyroid Medication

medications.indication: Indicated for the treatment of hypothyroidism in patients requiring a personalized ratio of T3 and T4 to restore optimal thyroid function. It is beneficial for individuals who do not respond adequately to T4-only therapy, experience persistent hypothyroid symptoms, or need a formulation free of allergens or specific excipients.

medications.name: MOTS-c
medications.description: MOTS-c is a mitochondrial-derived peptide composed of 16 amino acids, encoded within the mitochondrial genome. It regulates metabolic homeostasis, cellular energy production, and mitochondrial function by activating AMPK (AMP-activated protein kinase), a critical energy-sensing enzyme involved in cellular metabolism, insulin sensitivity, fat oxidation, and glucose uptake.
medications.indication: Supports metabolic health, enhances mitochondrial function, and improves energy production. Indicated for patients with metabolic dysfunction, insulin resistance, weight loss resistance, or chronic fatigue. MOTS-c improves glucose utilization, increases fat oxidation, reduces inflammation, and supports healthy aging and exercise recovery.

medications.name: Oral BPC-KPV
medications.description: Oral BPC-KPV is a peptide-based therapy that combines BPC-157, known for its regenerative and anti-inflammatory properties, with KPV, a potent tripeptide derived from alpha-melanocyte-stimulating hormone (α-MSH) that helps modulate immune response and reduce inflammation. This combination is designed to support gut health, tissue repair, and immune regulation, making it a promising option for individuals with gastrointestinal disorders, inflammatory conditions, and musculoskeletal injuries.
medications.indication: Oral BPC-KPV is indicated for individuals seeking support for gut health, immune modulation, and tissue repair. It is commonly used for conditions such as inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), leaky gut syndrome, gastritis, and other gastrointestinal disorders, as well as chronic inflammation and musculoskeletal injuries. By reducing inflammation, promoting cellular repair, and enhancing gut barrier integrity, BPC-KPV may aid in recovery from injury, optimize gut function, and support overall systemic healing.

medications.name: Larazotide (AT-1001)
medications.description: Larazotide (AT-1001) is an oral peptide that helps regulate intestinal permeability by modulating tight junctions in the gut lining. It is primarily researched for its role in managing leaky gut syndrome, celiac disease, and other inflammatory gut disorders. By preventing the breakdown of tight junctions, Larazotide supports gut barrier integrity, reduces inflammation, and may help mitigate symptoms related to increased intestinal permeability.
medications.indication: Larazotide (AT-1001) 500mcg is indicated for individuals with conditions linked to increased intestinal permeability, such as celiac disease, leaky gut syndrome, inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD), and autoimmune disorders. By modulating tight junctions in the gut lining, it helps reduce inflammation, support barrier integrity, and mitigate symptoms like bloating, brain fog, and digestive discomfort. It may also benefit metabolic and neurological conditions related to gut health, making it a promising adjunct therapy for those with chronic inflammation and immune dysregulation.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.

medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. medications.name: Wolverine (BPC-157 + TB-500 Combo)
medications.description: Wolverine combines BPC-157 and TB-500, two regenerative peptides that work synergistically to accelerate healing. BPC-157 supports tendon, ligament, muscle, and gut repair, while TB-500 enhances cell migration, blood flow, and tissue remodeling. Together, they provide a stronger, more comprehensive recovery effect than either peptide alone.

It’s ideal for individuals with high training volume, nagging injuries, or those looking to enhance repair and resilience.

medications.name: Armour Thyroid
medications.description: A prescription medication derived from desiccated porcine thyroid glands, used to treat hypothyroidism. It contains both T3 (liothyronine) and T4 (levothyroxine) hormones, providing a natural combination to supplement deficient thyroid hormone levels and restore balance in the body.
medications.indication: Designed to treat hypothyroidism by replacing insufficient thyroid hormones. Armour Thyroid helps regulate metabolism, boost energy levels, and support overall bodily functions, alleviating symptoms such as fatigue, weight gain, and cold intolerance. Requires careful dosage monitoring under medical supervision.

medications.name: GHK-Cu Peptide Treatment
medications.description: GHK-Cu Peptide is a powerful tripeptide bonded with copper ions, known for its ability to stimulate collagen production, support tissue repair, and combat signs of aging. Backed by decades of scientific research, GHK-Cu is safe for all skin types and a key component in anti-aging and regenerative treatments.
medications.indication: Clinically researched, it improves skin elasticity, reduces wrinkles, balances pigmentation, and promotes hair follicle repair for thicker, healthier hair. Additionally, it accelerates wound healing, reduces inflammation, and strengthens antioxidant defenses, making it ideal for post-procedure recovery and calming irritated skin.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: Retatrutide

medications.indication: The next-generation triple-action peptide therapy. By targeting GLP-1, GIP, and glucagon receptors, Retatrutide supports enhanced appetite control, improved metabolic health, and sustainable fat loss.

medications.name: Selank
medications.description: A synthetic peptide developed as an analog of the naturally occurring immunomodulatory peptide tuftsin. Selank exhibits pronounced anxiolytic (anti-anxiety) effects without the sedative and dependency side effects commonly associated with traditional tranquilizers. Additionally, it has demonstrated nootropic properties, enhancing cognitive functions such as memory and learning.
medications.indication: Selank is used to support anxiety relief, cognitive enhancement, and stress management. This synthetic peptide promotes a calming effect without sedation, improves memory and focus, and helps regulate the body's stress response for overall mental well-being.

medications.name: Tadalafil

medications.name: Testosterone Injectable

medications.name: LR3 IGF-1
medications.description: LR3 IGF-1 (Long R3 Insulin-like Growth Factor 1) is a synthetic analog of IGF-1 with a modified amino acid sequence that significantly increases its stability and bioavailability. Unlike native IGF-1, LR3 IGF-1 resists binding to IGF-binding proteins, allowing for a prolonged half-life and more potent biological activity. It activates IGF-1 receptors to stimulate muscle growth, tissue repair, and cellular regeneration, while also enhancing nutrient uptake and improving insulin sensitivity. Due to its powerful anabolic properties, LR3 IGF-1 is commonly researched in the contexts of performance enhancement, anti-aging, and recovery optimization.
medications.indication: Promotes muscle hypertrophy, accelerates recovery, and supports tissue regeneration by activating IGF-1 receptors and increasing protein synthesis. Its resistance to IGF-binding proteins makes it ideal for protocols involving muscle growth, injury recovery, metabolic enhancement, and cellular repair.
